chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going swimming?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽騎兵老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to English All Pass, my name is Kenneth Chee歡迎收聽口說英語通,我是騎兵老師In this unit, we are going to talk about a person you like to spend time with這個單元裡面我們要來談一談平常你最喜歡跟誰在一起混時間呢?好,那麼首先就讓我們來聽一下這個單元的問題以及我們的回答

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 戰野戀

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: He has always been there for me and helps me get through it.I can share my interests, my career plans or everything about my life with him.We only see each other during holidays these days because we now work in different cities.When we are together, we will always play sports together or do some grocery shopping.In fact, we always have a good time when we are together.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 騎兵,我們的題目是Describe a person with whom you like to spend time請你描述一個人那麼這個人呢是With whom跟他在一塊You like to spend time你願意跟他一起花時間就是一起混時間的人回答的時候呢第一個你就要說一下Who the person is and what relationship the two of you have

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 這個人是誰那你們兩個是什麼關係呢然後就要解釋一下Why you like to spend time with this person為什麼喜歡跟這個人一起混時間呢最後當然就要說一下What you usually do together你們在一起做些什麼呢一開始就說I spend a lot of time with DonnieMy brother and best friend我常常跟Donnie在一起

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 花時間與誰在一起或是跟某人一起度過時間Donnie後面My brother and best friend是同位於就是進一步說明他是我的兄弟也是我的好朋友I've known him all my life我已經認識他一輩子了Have known是現在完成時表示已經認識了一段時間那後面呢All my life一輩子

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: Donnie is a very considerate and thoughtful person接著就說了Donnie是一個非常體貼有體人著想的人considerate是一個形容詞就是體貼的thoughtful這個字是一個形容詞表示考慮周到的或者是體貼的When I was littleHe usually took good care of me他說當我小的時候呢他總是照顧我

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: Take care of這個片語呢就是照顧Care to me加上了一個形容詞goodTake good care of就是好好照顧Even nowWhenever I have a bad dayHe has always been there for meAnd helps me get through it他說Even now就算是現在Whenever是一個連接詞表示是無論何時Have a bad day

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 就是那不如意的一天就是說當我有不如意的時候He has always been there for me他一直都是支持我的Be there for someone意思就是支持某人的意思And helps me get through it而且總是幫我度過下面有說

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 有一個動詞叫做分享那使用的時候我們常常說Share something with someone就是與某人分享某事那我可以跟他分享什麼呢後面列出了三個東西My interests我的興趣My career plans我的職業計劃Or everything about my life或者是我人生所有的事情最後一段就說到

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 他說我們現在呢We only see each other我們現在只有見面See each other就是見到彼此的意思During holidays就是在假期的時候These days就是這些日子就是最近後面說

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 現在我們在不同的城市工作When we are togetherWe will always play sports togetherOr do some grocery shopping當我們在一塊的時候When we are together就是我們一塊的時候We will always play sports together那我們總是呢會一起運動一下Play sports就是運動的意思Or do some grocery shopping

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 不然呢就是做日常生活的購物In factWe always have a good timeWhen we are togetherIn fact事實上我們在一起總是很開心Have a good time這是個騙語就是很開心的意思

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 就是花時間跟誰在一起那麼time前面可以加上形容詞比如說像是a lot of跟某人在一起很多時間我們來看一下例句就是在週末的時候我都是跟家人在一起第二個句型

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 這個騙語的意思就是總是在某人身邊支持著某人我們看一下例句Friends are always there for each other朋友呢總是支持著彼此下面一句My parents have always been there for me我父母親一直以來都在我身邊支持著我那這邊就像是我們剛的回答樣用了現在完成式

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: Have always been there for me就是一直以來都在我身邊支持著我第三個句型See each other就是見面的意思See是動詞見到看見Each other相互代名詞當受詞使用表示彼此所以see each other就是彼此見面看一下例子He moved out of the cityWe don't see each other often

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 他說了He moved out of the city他搬出城了So we don't see each other often我們就沒有常常見面了Words and phrases詞彙騙語

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 英語說得通你喜歡跟誰在一起Describe a person with whom you like to spend time.
chunks.chunk_text: 很開心今天我們談論的是A person with whom you like to spend time你平常都喜歡跟誰在一起那麼希望您都學會了OK that's all for this unit最後請記得每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通我是奇畢老師Until then see you next time
